author: Fahmida
text: This deliciously fruity and refreshing dried Anjeer will have you feeling like it's summer all year round. Made with best quality large size fruit.

author: Zeina Hasan
text: The white spots are quite natural with dried figs and these are not fungus.after eating some figs, my impression is that these figs are of good quality,  very sweet.

author: Hasnahena
text: With a significant amount of potassium, dry fig are excellent for lowering blood pressure.With a good amount of vitamin E, vitamin C and calcium, these dried fruits can give your skin a much-needed boost.

author: Ummay Bi
text: Just awesome, Highly recommended. This product has produced and reserved by maintaining of International standard.

author: Shakhawat Hossen
text: Alhamdulillah, this is a wonderful things to eat. Very good packing and one time delivery. And although small in size, test was very much delicious, I ate it first time. I will take it again.

author: Jamil Ahamed
text: এটা মিষ্টি কিন্তু এটা ডায়াবেটিস রোগীরা  খেতে পারবে এবং ডায়াবেটিস রোগীদের জন্য অত্যন্ত উপকারী একটি ফল।
